name: Dead And: AI Academy
description:
A game made in Python!

First person shooter where you alternate control with a neural network which learns from you actions. You can make adjustments to the topology of the neural network, adding neurons and layers. Credits for new neural networks are earned by finishing levels and when the AI kills an enemy.

After finishing the training course you can try the test course, where the AI has to fight alone (not sure if this is practical).

This is a work in progress, needs a lot of refinement.
